content: this crochet leg warmer pattern is written in us terms there is an accompanying video available on youtube 1 as well linked in the pattern the written pattern includes step by step photos and all the details that it is sometimes hard to catch in videos skill level upper beginner yardage you will need 2 balls of dk/ 8 ply yarn or 348 metres/ 381 yards for this project **let s be friends follow crochetlovemelbourne on** instagram pinterest youtube website see below **sign up** to my newsletter for new patterns discounts new blog free patterns at www crochetlovemelbourne com **ask for help** anytime from me to support my patterns through email you will find it in the pattern 1 https //youtu be/vgcjaifum-0
